title: My Best FriendÂ´s Brother
description: Charlotte Sloan was bored and tired of being ignored by her husband, Jake. She goes out for a night on the town with her best friend and brother. Determined not to be alone that night, she sets out to enjoy the things that she used to enjoy doing with her husband. Until an attraction is revealed, a mistake is made, and Charlotte starts to wonder the consequences back home for her night on the town.
author: Foxy Tale
